nodes.text: Genter Fosse was a male Mandalorian who was allied with the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, he was stationed in the Imperial base camp.
Genter Fosse first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Bounty Hunter class trainer on Ilum.
